column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of the SrTb2O4 compound were synthesized with raw materials SrCO3 (Alfa Aesar, 99.99%) and
#Text=solid-state reaction method.51 The phase purity of raw
#Text=materials was checked by XRPD at room temperature.
#Text=avoid the humidity effect on the quality of raw materials, they
#Text=are always stored in a dry atmosphere at 493 K.
#Text=materials was milled and mixed with a 50 mm-diameter ball by
#Text=1 h, and then we calcined them in air for three times, 1373 K
#Text=for 24 h, 1473 K for 36 h, and 1573 K for 24 h, with both
#Text=calcination, we milled and mixed the intermediate reaction
#Text=materials again to get fine grains for a homogeneous reaction
